MajorClaims.Text: human beings should travel to outer space
there are some reasons for human beings to travel to outer space

Claims.Text: many facts about solar system can be discovered
people can know more about the planet earth itself
a great deal of sophisticated technology can be invented

Premises.Text: a picture of planet earth proved that the earth is round, not flat
it is the earth which goes around the sun, not vice versa
If it was not for the space exploration, we would never know these facts
By observing planet earth from outer space, people can find out ample things for example about the atmosphere of the planet earth
With this knowledge, people can work on something to prevent earth hazards such as global warming
As astronauts need to travel to outer space which does not have any oxygen to breathe in, scientists are compelled to do research on the oxygen tanks
Oxygen tanks, for instance, are proved useful not only in outer space but also underwater
spaceships, communication satellites and space pens also contribute a lot to the society
